title: 03/16/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/16/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses Baker Mayfield's premature letter to Brown's fans. Does he know something that we don't know? ESPN NFL analyst Marcus Spears tells us which team he thinks would be the perfect fit for Deshaun Watson. And NBA on TNT's Jim Jackson explains why 60 points is the new 50 in the NBA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
